name: A Saviour Hero - Help our Army to Defeat Terrorist Intruders!
name_original: A Saviour Hero - Help our Army to Defeat Terrorist Intruders!
description:
You are the Nation Saviour! Attack all enemies before they reach the battle ground.
Enter this mission now and show your fast skills! Can you reach the top Medal Charts?
Attack them all to collect your medal of honor.

Features:

+ Challenging levels!
+ Universal app, enjoy it on your favorite iOS device.
+ Multiple TARGETS
+ Enjoy hours of fun for FREE

Get this super addictive game right now!

*** Don't forget to rate and share your feedback with our community. We appreciate your opinion***
